file_content.text: You got me. Good for you. You want a medal?
You and me, this battle, the war. Not even a blink in the grand scheme of things.
Corellia's been around a lot longer than the Sith's little upstart Empire, and it'll be around long after the Empire falls.
I make do with the here and now.
Probably.
I've been to Taris, Commissioner. The Empire knows how to make a lasting impression.
I hope you're right.
They... they wouldn't go that far. Would they?
I'm not the one you should ask.
Can't say.
You really want to take that risk?
They might.
Sleep on it.
Overkill isn't in their vocabulary.
Of course.
You could use a hand with that chip on your shoulder.
I've heard enough out of you.
Hehe.
Tormen. The commissioner is secure.
Good.
Our forces have control of the Corellian Legislature. Deliver Commissioner Carter to the Grand Assembly.
Your reward will be waiting.
Well, look at you. Waltzing in here like you own the place. Come to finish what they started?
Got somethin' special in mind for you, copper.
Go on and kill me. You'll have a million citizens rioting in the streets by sundown.
I won't have anything except a pile of credits.
Not my problem.
That goon Falcone already tried to have the Empire knock me off; didn't work out so well for them.
You got any idea how many lowlifes have tried retiring the only honest chief of police this city's had in decades? A lot.
You want to try your luck, baby doll? Be my guest, but I've got something to ask you first.
You want to try your luck, tough guy? Be my guest, but I've got something to ask you first.
That's too bad. [Attack]
Don't call me "doll."
The answer's no.
I'll give you that much.
Clock's ticking.
He's stalling. Makes you wonder why.
Good place for an ambush. Keep this quick.
Huh, guess I'd be in real trouble, if I were here to kill you.
Sorry, I'm not an assassin.
If you aren't out for blood, why are you here?
You'll find out soon enough.
This. [Attack]
I'm a bounty hunter, what do you think?
I'll give you one guess.
I think you're greedy, amoral scum, here to sell me to the highest bidder. Imperials, I'll bet.
You're late for your surrender.
I'm here to make you kneel.
I get it... Too late to kill me, so you gotta make me look like a rat.
By sundown, a million citizens are gonna watch you shaking hands with the Empire.
No more playing hero for you.
Over my dead body.
Even if you slave-drivers break me, you won't be fooling anyone. Corellians aren't as dumb as you seem to think.
Time to put that theory to the test.
One way to find out. [Attack]
Backup! Now!
If your people want to keep fighting, that's fine by me.
Never said you were.
If you've got no stake in Corellia, why are you here? Hutt Cartel short on credits?
We've got our sights set a lot higher than your public.
That's not who I hope to fool.
So that's your game? Shake up the Core Worlds? Get the Senate in a panic?
Careful. He's trying to get you to talk, makes you wonder why.
I hear something. Keep this quick.
The people you're working for, they aren't spice runners or thugs looking for a quick fortune. They're despots.
Do this, and you'll force billions of people to bow before the Sith. Is the Empire paying you enough to clear your conscience of that?
I'm not here for a debate.
You've said enough. [Attack]
Now hold on, I want an answer! Hold on--move, move now!
Better they bow than continue getting caught in the cross fire.
The alternative's a lot worse.
Well, aren't you just a darling.
You're a real gentleman.
More than enough.
You'd sell your own mother for two credits. Locking you up is too good for trash like you.
Thanks for the chat. Now I know that what I've been doing is making a difference.
Hit 'em.
Owie! Boss? Blizz lose eyes! Boss, help!
Ah! What'd I tell you? Duck!
Grrah! Stinkin' law. Gonna tear you apart!
Surrounded!
Where are you? I-- I can't see!
